title: Strengthening Practical App Development Competencies: Instructional Design Strategies Through Language Function Analysis of EFL Textbooks

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational system-functional linguistics, basic understanding of EFL materials development and analysis
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: The systemic functional linguistics framework (experiential, interactional, and textual metafunctions) can be applied to systematically analyze EFL textbook texts.
The transitivity system (process types), mood structure, and noun phrase structure analysis can be used to derive linguistic characteristics of instructional materials.
Based on the analysis results, learners can plan customized instructional design activities tailored to learner needs.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
